metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5633 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.Description: The reference count changes made as part of the CVE-2023-33951 andCVE-2023-33952 fixes exposed a use-after-free flaw in the way memoryobjects were handled when they were being used to store a surface. Whenrunning inside a VMware guest with 3D acceleration enabled, a local,unprivileged user could potentially use this flaw to escalate theirprivileges.
